title: [K-12] Culturally Based Pedagogical Design for Teaching Numeracy in Indigenous Languages

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and general understanding of Indigenous cultures
context.additional_context: Pre-service/in-service teachers learn to analyze their native language-based numeral systems and convert them into educational materials, emphasizing interactive activities through blended online platforms and offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the numeral systems of 14 Mesoamerican languages and explain their core principles.
Learners can design at least three instructional materials reflecting the cultural contexts of non-standard numeral systems, such as base-20.
Learners can validate the effectiveness of developed educational materials with over 80% appropriateness through peer evaluation and feedback.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
